title: Basketball
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 993 words, Level R (Grade 3), Lexile 1040L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     I and Y
description: Basketball began with a peach basket nailed to a post and has grown to become one of the world's most popular sports. Engage students with interesting information about the game, its origins, and some of its famous athletes. Exciting images, maps, and diagrams enhance the text.
highFrequencyWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
